SQL_STMT_U.val: select COUNT(T1.DocEntry),SUM(T1.DocTotal) from ODLN T1 WITH (NOLOCK) JOIN OBPL ON T1.BPLID = OBPL.BPLID where (obpl.BPLName like '%'+':3'+'%') and datasource = 'I' and docdate between ':1' and ':2'

select DocEntry, ObjType,docStatus,canceled,FinncPriod from ODLN T1 JOIN OBPL ON T1.BPLID = OBPL.BPLID where (obpl.BPLName like '%'+':3'+'%') and datasource = 'I' and docdate between ':1' and ':2' order by docentry desc

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans('Which One Do You Want To Print? (YES for header, NO for detail)')
